name: Dante's Infernya
description:
Raise hell in your owner’s apartment as Virgil the cat, destroying everything in your path while avoiding getting caught! 

Use your agility and powerful jumps to your advantage as you scale furniture, set off distractions and hide from the owner’s attempts to stop you.

  • Single-player 3d action platformer
  • PC
  • Keyboard / mouse and Xbox controller support

CONTROLS

Keyboard / Mouse:

  • Movement – WASD / arrow keys
  • Camera – Mouse
  • Jump – Space
  • Super jump – hold left shift, aim with mouse, release to jump
  • Swipe – Left mouse button / E
  • Pause – ESC

Xbox controller:

  • Movement – Left stick
  • Camera – Right stick
  • Jump – X / Y / A / B / Left stick press
  • Super jump – Hold left trigger, aim with right stick, release to jump
  • Swipe – Right trigger
  • Pause - Start
